title: Ticket #6670: HTCondor View: HTML generation
description: We need a way to generate the HTML for HTCondor View, both for us to write the default pages and for users to customize their own pages. The plan is to use the Jinja2 template system (http://jinja.pocoo.org/docs/). This will significantly reduce the headache of writing raw HTML.
check_ins: 2018-May-04 13:56   Check-in [54853]: implemented a small static site generator using jinja2 to render HTML for HTCondorView (#6670) replicated most of existing pages, and started implementing the default pages (By JoshKarpel )
creator: karpel
